A

apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.BaseTextFunction
Returns the input text without any modifications.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.CapitalizeDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and capitalizes the first letter of each word in the resulting text.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.ConvertAcronymDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and replaces certain phrases in the resulting text with their acronym equivalents.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.DeduplicateDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and removes consecutive duplicate words from the resulting text.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.ExpandAcronymDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and expands recognized acronyms in the resulting text into their full forms.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.LatexDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and escapes all LaTeX special characters in the resulting text according to the predefined rules.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.LowerCaseDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and converts its result to lowercase.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.NumberToWordsDecorator
Applies the decorated TextFunction and converts all numeric sequences in the result into their word equivalents.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.ReverseDecorator
Applies the wrapped TextFunction and then reverses the resulting string.
apply(String) - Method in interface put.text_transformer.functions.TextFunction
Applies a transformation to the given input text.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.TextFunctionDecorator
Applies the wrapped TextFunction.
apply(String) - Method in class put.text_transformer.functions.UpperCaseDecorator
Applies the wrapped function and converts the result to uppercase.
applyDecorators(TextFunction, Iterable<String>) - Static method in class put.text_transformer.DecoratorRegistry
Applies a sequence of decorators (actions) to the given base TextFunction.

B

BaseTextFunction - Class in put.text_transformer.functions
A basic implementation of the TextFunction interface that returns the input text unchanged.

C

CapitalizeDecorator - Class in put.text_transformer.functions
A decorator class that capitalizes the first letter of each word in the input text, while converting the rest of the letters to lowercase.
CapitalizeDecorator(TextFunction) - Constructor for class put.text_transformer.functions.CapitalizeDecorator
Constructs a CapitalizeDecorator that wraps a given TextFunction.
ConvertAcronymDecorator - Class in put.text_transformer.functions
A decorator class that converts commonly used phrases in the input text to their corresponding acronyms or abbreviations.
ConvertAcronymDecorator(TextFunction) - Constructor for class put.text_transformer.functions.ConvertAcronymDecorator
Constructs a ConvertAcronymDecorator that wraps a given TextFunction.
